body:
Add a proper install variant for Catch(2) that installs a CMake config package, https://github.com/catchorg/Catch2/pull/1170.

This allows to use Catch2 downstram with `pkg-config` and CMake's `find_package(Catch2)` commands via standard environment hints such as `CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH`.
title: Catch2: CMake Config Package
